author: Dylan Weagly
comment: Paid for this theme but it will not install (I tried over 10 times). Purchased 4 other themes and they installed fine. Message says this is from an unknown source... Fix this and also, make more square faces! The Gear is square, only makes sense.
title: Fix Install Issue

author: Chris Armistead
comment: Won't sync, indicates wrong time. Why time I restart the watch, the theme disappears, this never happened with other watchstyler themes.

reply.author: OMNIC&S
reply.content:
Please update to a new version Watch Styler
The hour hand solved the problem of representation different from the actual time.
Update of our new version of Watch Styler was January 23rd.

title: The theme disappears

author: Damian Molina
comment: I want my money back, fraudulent app.    THE APP REQUIRED TO INSTALL THESE WATCH FACES "WATCH STYLER" HAS BEEN BANNED FROM THE GALAXY APP STORE AND IF YOU CAN FIND THE APK ONLINE, THE GEAR MANAGER HAS ALSO DISABLED THE APP BY SAMSUNG UPDATE.
title: Screw you. Will not install

author: Jeff Milliard
comment: I have tried to install but it disappears about 5 seconds afterwords.  Have latest android os 5.0 lollipop. Latest watch styler app but still will not install. Needs to be fixed.  1 star till fixed.
title: Does not install

author: Shaun Mulrainey
comment: Please can you sort out the time as the hour hand keeps moving to fast so when it's say for example 5:45 it's showing 6:45 please fix this

reply.author: OMNIC&S
reply.content:
Please update to a new version Watch Styler
The hour hand solved the problem of representation different from the actual time.

title: Samsung Note 4

author: Fidel Mercado
comment: Just paid and it won't install !Rip off:

reply.author: OMNIC&S
reply.content: Hi. The theme available via Watch Styler. How to Download guides to watch styler. - Watch Styler can not download via Google play. Only download Watch Styler via Gear Manager>Samsung Gear Apps (Download Guide video : http://youtu.be/d79m_Myi3uU ) If you need additional guidance, please contact us by email. yangji@omnicns.com
